entry.title: Gentle until shattered
entry.summary:
Author: Lucerne3149D

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,227Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 29

Summary: “…Does it hurt?” Dick's voice was rough, laced with worry. Jason panted, a weak, sated smile tugging at his mouth. “Hurts… but fuck, it was perfect.” He hooked an arm around Dick's neck, pulling him down, voice hoarse. “Next time… do it like that again.” Dick laughed softly and kissed him. “Deal. Anything you want.”

entry.title: XX, Bunny
entry.summary:
Author: sarriathmg

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,332Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 68

Summary: Red X was great with bunnies, Roy said. Knew how to play a bunny’s pleasure like a fiddle. All the Titan-bunnies went to him. The best part? He was always willing to take new bunnies into his den to give them what they needed—to be railed and dominated by a predator during the climax of their heat. And, as everyone knew, bunnies were always in heat. But Red X has a secret that Roy hasn't told Jason about. A secret that would've been nice to know beforehand. X is, under the disguise, Dick Grayson. Jason's predecessor, whose relationship with Jason is more than a little awkward to say the least.

entry.summary:
Author: Nyx_dreamy

That is how he end up living with Dick. Dick is conflicated about his feelings for Jason. Damian is now under his care and him and Bruce are still awkward around each other. entry.title: Blind Faith
entry.summary:
Author: AxisMage

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 236,308Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 226

Summary: It's no one's fault but his own that Dick is sitting there now, cold and utterly miserable, and very close to freezing to death. It's no one's fault but his own that he let his heart and mind get away again. It's no one's fault but his own that he wanted for someone who couldn't and wouldn't be his, and Wally is right. Dick needs to get back to his life, start over and make new friends. That's all, nothing more and nothing less. Friends, Dick needs friends, and sadly (according to Wally), Krypto isn't enough.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 223,363Chapters: 48/53Kudos: 1,740

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.
